thread.title: The Morning Risk Report: GDPR Compliance Could Hamper Internal Probes - Risk & Compliance Journal. - WSJ

author: Ben DiPietro
title: The Morning Risk Report: GDPR Compliance Could Hamper Internal Probes - Risk & Compliance Journal. - WSJ

organizations.name: gdpr compliance could hamper internal probes - risk & compliance journal

text:
Readers can subscribe to The Morning Risk Report here: http://on.wsj.com/MorningRiskReportSignup. Follow us on Twitter at @WSJRisk. iStockphoto.com/Peter Howell Good morning. Organizations working to comply with the European Union’s General Data Protection Regulation may be at risk of losing information that can help them in internal investigations. Deleting personal data before GDPR takes effect May 25 […]
